channel.title: Terraform on sambaiz-net
channel.description: Recent content in Terraform on sambaiz-net

item.title: Setting up GCP's managed Airflow service Cloud Composer using Terraform and running workflows
item.description:
Cloud Composer is a managed service for Apache Airflow. It’s equivalent of MWAA by AWS.

Create an environment of Amazon Managed Workflow for Apache Airflow (MWAA) with CDK and run a workflow - sambaiz-net

Pricing differs between Composer 2 and Composer 3, which is currently review, but it’s mainly based on CPU, memory, and storage usage. While it runs on GKE, existing clusters cannot be used. This cluster can be seen when Composer 2 is used, but will no longer be displayed from 3.
